creditline: Gift of Shared Ventures in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: elderly man with white hair, seen from back, wearing a sweater and light-colored pants, walking on a road in a desert landscape with some scrubby plants
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

on back, in pencil: [BAM 1971 016 W00720/97]
signed: LRC in margin, in black marker: [Micha Bar-Am]; on back, in pencil: [DAVID BEN GURION, KIBBUTZ SDE BOKER, 1971 / © / Micha Bar-Am/MAGNUM]
title: Mr. David Ben Gurion during his daily walk into part of the Negev Desert, near his new home, at the Kibbutz Sde Boker
